description: This file defines a servlet filter class 'AppAuthUserFilter' that processes HTTP requests to extract and log a user authentication ID from a custom header, and sets this ID in a request context.

classes.name: AppAuthUserFilter
classes.description: A servlet filter that extracts a user ID from a custom HTTP header, logs it, and sets it in the request context.

methods.name: doFilter
methods.description: Processes each incoming request to extract user ID, logs it, updates context, and ensures context is cleared after processing.
